properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne dooramaithi neeku nashiyinchiti lokamuna Nenu grahincha ledu nee hrudaya premanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne thalacha ledepudu naa anthamemaunani Naa paapamulache nenu ninnu visiginchitini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ninnu ne gaancha gane naa jeevitamu maarenu Nenentho grutchabadi ninnangeekarinchiti{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
